short_description: ecopie services is a garbage collection & waste disposal services company based in san francisco, california, united states.
long_description: formed in 2016, on the idea of providing sustainable solutions to the organizations both government and non-government working on various environmental and social issues in india. we offer end to end services to our clients whether you are a beginner or a pro our services are scalable from research to implimentation. our expertise stretch from on ground services to management of projects. we are team ready to take up challenging activities and achieve them. ecopie has experts in capacity building aspects. we train the youth and other organization staff on various thematic areas like solid waste management, liquid waste management and other environmental aspects etc. ecopie is determined to broaden the spectrum of impact through networking & collaboration with associates, experts & partners and to reach out to a larger customer base. ecopie has research professionals who work on the critical social and environmental thematic areas. organizational sucess is ressembelled. our mission is to design, implement and deliver innovative services and solutions in waste management with a focus on technology and operations to transform societies to benefit from living a quality and pollution free lifestyle.
generated_description: ecopie, legally known as ecopie services llp., founded in 2016 and based in hyderabad, telangana, is a company specializing in waste management solutions. the company focuses on providing innovative services and solutions in solid and liquid waste management, utilizing technology and operational expertise. ecopie services aims to transform societies by promoting pollution-free environments and preserving the environment for future generations. the company offers end-to-end services, including research, implementation, and capacity building, and collaborates with various organizations to address environmental and social issues.
